comments: Turner (IND) is firming up over his right leg when contact with White (BOS) occurs during the pick.

call_type: Turnover: Lost Ball Out of Bounds
comments: Mathurin (IND) is the last player to touch the ball before it goes out of bounds.  Possession is correctly awarded to the Celtics.
Nesmith (IND) is moving alongside Brown's (BOS) path and marginal contact occurs during the drive.
Nesmith (IND) pulls his hand away from Brown (BOS) and his right hand grazes Brown's arm as he enters his upward shooting motion. The contact during the jump shot attempt is marginal.
Turner (IND) is firming up over his left leg in Brown's (BOS) path and does not deliver contact during the pick.
White's (BOS) hand brushes Mathurin's (IND) off-arm as he aligns alongside Mathurin's path during the drive and the contact is marginal.
Brown (BOS) and Turner (IND) come together at the same spot on the floor and the contact away from the ball is marginal.
Holiday (BOS) cleanly deflects the ball away from McConnell (IND).

call_type: Turnover:  Out of Bounds - Bad Pass Turn
comments: Mathurin (IND) is the last player to touch the ball before the ball goes out of bounds.  Possession is correctly awarded to the Celtics.
Holiday (BOS) establishes himself in McConnell's (IND) path and does not deliver contact during the pick.
Holiday (BOS) pulls his left arm away from McConnell's (IND) path and marginal arm contact occurs during McConnell's driving shot attempt.
Nesmith (IND) and Brown (BOS) come together at the same spot on the floor and the contact during Brown's dribble is marginal.
Porzingis' (BOS) hand lightly brushes Nesmith's (IND) arm as he sets the screen and the contact on the play is marginal.
Nesmith (IND) places and promptly removes his hand from Brown's (BOS) front and the contact at the start of the drive is marginal.
Turner (IND) firms up in White's (BOS) path and marginal contact occurs as the two players come together during the pick.

On replay review, the coach's challenge of the shooting foul called on Hield (IND) was deemed successful.  The video clearly shows that Hield reaches forward and makes contact with the ball from behind Brown (BOS).  While in contact with the ball, Hield also makes minimal contact with Brown's head, and on review that contact was correctly deemed incidental.  As the rulebook makes clear, the mere fact that contact occurs does not necessarily constitute a foul; contact which is incidental to an effort by a player to defend an opponent, reach a loose ball, or perform normal defensive or offensive movements is not considered illegal.  Play resumed with IND possession, since Nesmith (IND) had imminent possession at the point of interruption.
White (BOS) commits a take foul on Mathurin (IND).
Turner (IND) firms up over his right leg and marginal contact occurs as Brown (BOS) moves into the screen.
Turner (IND) turns his lower body into White (BOS) and delivers contact during the screen.

Porzingis (BOS) is above the ball and legally contests Mathurin's (IND) shot attempt, with some incidental arm contact occurring concurrent with the block. Referees conducted a replay review to determine if the foul was called with no time remaining on the clock (00:00), and determined it was called before the expiration of time. The clock was reset with 0.6 remaining on the clock.  The foul itself was not a reviewable matter under this replay trigger.
Turner (IND) momentarily rests his hand on Kornet's (BOS) shoulder and the marginal contact dissolves as both players launch into the air to make a play on the ball.
Horford (BOS) and Jackson (IND) engage as the inbounds pass is released into the air and the contact is marginal.

Turner (IND) brings his hand toward the ball and his arm grazes the top of Kornet's (BOS) head during his contest of the tip-in attempt at the basket and the contact is marginal. Contact to an opponent's head/face can be deemed marginal when the result of a natural basketball move, provided the contact is not disproportionate or uncontrolled.
